payload.description: Create frontend/src/pages/courses/CourseBuilder.jsx. Two-column layout: quest list sidebar + content editor. Course metadata editor (title, description, intro_content JSONB). Quest list with drag-drop reordering (@dnd-kit). Add quest modal (select from org quests). Remove quest button. Publish button (calls publishCourse API, creates badge). Save status indicator. Responsive mobile drawer.
